amendment.description: To extend the period of availability for fiscal year 2021 national infrastructure investments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1120 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1120 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5160-5163) To extend the period of availability for fiscal year 2021 national infrastructure investments.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1120 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1120 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 1092.
